scripts.build:vocabs: node packages/data-processing/scripts/process-vocab.js --profiles data/config/profiles.ttl --sourceDir data/vocabs --outputBase web/public/export/vocabs --systemDir web/public/export/system --pattern "*.ttl" --backgroundDir data/background --validators data/validators
scripts.build:vocablist: node packages/data-processing/scripts/generate-vocablist.js --sourceDir data/vocabs --output .cache/catalog.ttl && node packages/data-processing/scripts/process-vocab.js --profiles data/config/profiles.ttl --source .cache/catalog.ttl --type catalog --outDir web/public/export/system/vocabularies --backgroundDir data/background
scripts.build:ensure-data: if [ ! -d data/vocabs ] || [ -z "$(ls -A data/vocabs/*.ttl 2>/dev/null)" ]; then echo 'No vocabs found in data/, using sample-data'; mkdir -p data/vocabs data/background data/config && cp sample-data/vocabs/*.ttl data/vocabs/ && cp sample-data/config/profiles.ttl data/config/profiles.ttl && cp sample-data/manifest.ttl data/manifest.ttl && if [ -d sample-data/background ] && ls sample-data/background/*.ttl >/dev/null 2>&1; then cp sample-data/background/*.ttl data/background/; fi; fi && mkdir -p sample-data/background && touch sample-data/background/.gitkeep
scripts.build:all-export: pnpm build:clean-export && pnpm build:ensure-data && pnpm build:vocabs && pnpm build:vocablist && pnpm build:vocab-metadata && pnpm build:labels && pnpm build:search
